Flow.description: Allows for the recording of OPU event details and creates eggs and egg batches for future insemination.
Flow.label: Create OPU Cycle Event

fields.name: ErrorText
fields.fieldText: There has been an error. Please alert admin.

fields.name: PatinetDets
fields.fieldText:
Name: {!Get_Cycle.Patient__r.FirstName} {!Get_Cycle.Patient__r.LastName}

DOB: {!Get_Cycle.Patient__r.Birthdate} Patient ID: {!Get_Cycle.Patient__r.Patient_ID_Display_Formula__c} Patinet Address: {!Get_Cycle.Patient__r.Mailing_Address__c}

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Add Pat ID 1 Witness","value":"Add Pat ID 1 Witness","iconPosition":"left","variant":"brand-outline","index":0},{"label":"Add Pat ID 2 Witness","value":"Add Pat ID 2 Witness","iconPosition":"left","variant":"brand-outline","index":1},{"label":"Add Tube ID Witness","value":"Add Tube ID Witness","iconPosition":"left","variant":"brand-outline","index":2},{"label":"Add Dish ID Witness","value":"Add Dish ID Witness","iconPosition":"left","variant":"brand-outline","index":3}]

fields.name: Witness_Text
fields.fieldText: Patient ID 1: {!PatientID1WitnessVar.Name} Patient ID 2: {!PatientID2WitnessVar.Name} Tube ID: {!TubeID1WitnessVar.Name} Dish ID: {!DishID1WitnessVar.Name}

fields.name: NobookingText
fields.fieldText: No valid OPU booking exists and as such an OPU cycle event cannot be created.

fields.name: Noeggs
fields.fieldText: You must enter an egg number before proceeding.

fields.name: nmotallwit
fields.fieldText: You have not recorded all witnesses, please confirm that you want to proceed without this data.
